2.「あの程度が ヤツの仕業のはずもない。| 次は もっと 手強いのを頼む。: There's no way he could have done that. Next|time, I want something tougher.

3.「お前も師匠も ヤツの気配を感じとった。| ダークネスが現れるところを つぶして:
You and your master have both sensed his|presence. If you keep crushing the places|where Darkness appears, you will surely see|
|him again soon.

4.「……憎悪の色が 極端に濃くなっている。| 感情の暴走は 身の破滅につながるわ。: ...is a very intense hatred. Emotional|outbursts can be your own undoing. If|something were to happen to you...

6.「だが 自分がどうなろうが 知ったことか。| ヤツは 絶対に 追いつめる。| …: But I don't care what happens to me. I will|definitely hunt him down. I will surely kill|him with my own hands.

7.「彼はディゼル。ここで いちばんのウデ利きよ。| 見ての通り 不愛想だけど| 誰:
He is Diezel. He's the best in the place. As|you can see, he's not very sociable, but he's|like that with everyone, so don't worry about|
|it.

8.「魔剣士は 心に闇を抱えた| ワケありの人たち。彼の抱えている闇は| 特に深く: Demon swordsmen are people with a Dark Mind.|The darkness he carries is especially deep,|dark...

9.「でも あなただって……そうでしょう？| 自分では 気づいていないかもしれないけ: But even you... don't you? You may not be|aware of it, but you are living with a great|Dark Mind and pain inside.

10.「これまで感じてきた 悲しみや絶望 憎悪……| その痛みは すべて あなたのチカ: All the sadness, despair, and hatred you've|ever felt... all that pain will be your|strength. You will be strong.

11.「……さて。さっそく あなたに| 頼みたいことがあるから| 魔剣士に転職して ま: ...Well. Right away, I have a favor to ask of|you...will you change your job to demon|swordsman and come back to see me again?

12.「魔剣士の戦い方について 知りたければ| あそこに すわっている| ギブソンさん: If you want to know how demon swordsmen fight,|ask Mr. Gibson sitting over there.

13.「あなたには 期待してるわ。| これから よろしくね。: I have high expectations for you. I'm looking|forward to working with you.
